articles.title: Argentina win record 16th Copa America in match marred by crowd chaos - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Argentina beat Colombia 1-0 in extra time as the play was delayed by more than an hour as fans try to storm the stadium.
articles.content:
Argentina have lifted their 16th Copa America title, with their biggest star Lionel Messi likely bidding farewell to international football.
